datafu.pig.hash.lsh.p_stable

Class L1LSH

  • java.lang.Object
    • datafu.pig.hash.lsh.interfaces.LSH
      • datafu.pig.hash.lsh.p_stable.AbstractStableDistributionFunction
        • datafu.pig.hash.lsh.p_stable.L1LSH
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Sampler

    public class L1LSH
extends AbstractStableDistributionFunction
implements Sampler
    A locality sensitive hash associated with the L1 metric. This uses a 1-stable distribution to construct the hash.

    • Method Detail

      • sample

        public double sample(org.apache.commons.math.random.RandomDataImpl randomData)
              throws org.apache.commons.math.MathException
        Draw a sample s ~ Cauchy(0,1), which is 1-stable.
        Specified by:
        sample in interface Sampler
        Parameters:
        randomData - random data generator
        Returns:
        a sample from a cauchy distribution with median 0 and scale 1
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.math.MathException - MathException

      • getSampler

        protected Sampler getSampler()
        Description copied from class: AbstractStableDistributionFunction
        The sampler determines the metric which this LSH is associated with. A 1-stable sample will yield a LSH which corresponds to a L1 metric; likewise for 2-stable and L2.
        Specified by:
        getSampler in class AbstractStableDistributionFunction
        Returns:
        The sampler to use.
